name: SpareParts(DemonstratingCreativity)
0:
”Alexa, open Spare Parts”
”Alexa, start Spare Parts”
”Alexa, Play Spare Parts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spare parts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Spare Parts is designed to help kids build a variety of cognitive (e.g., critical thinking, working memory, etc.) and non-cognitive (e.g., persistence, creativity, etc.) skills in a fun, engaging way. Our robot has a few broken / missing parts such as a Memory Card, Processor, Battery, Password, Speaker, GPS module, etc. and children must use different skills to solve them .

About SayKid
For more screen-less, play-based learning, search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill Store. By combining voice technology and real-world, tangible play, we help educators and families learn together in a safe, natural, and engaging way - without screens!

If you found the skill helpful, we greatly appreciate reviews!

Awards
- SayKid wins Grand Prize in the 2020 Alexa EdTech Competition 
- Harvard names SayKid a Finalist in the Saul Zaentz Early Education Competition
- SayKid wins MN Cup "Moonshot" Prize at US Bank Stadium
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
